cast.name: Willy T. Ribbs Willy T. Ribbs

this_title: Willy T Ribbs: Motorsport's Black Pioneer
trans_title: 威利·T·里布斯：赛车黑人先锋
introduction: A profile of Willy T Ribbs, the first black man to drive a Formula One car and the first black Indy 500 driver. Inspired by few, inspiration to many, he helped break down the colour barrier in American Motorsport.
chinese_title: 威利·T·里布斯：赛车黑人先锋
foreign_title: Willy T Ribbs: Motorsport's Black Pioneer
